text: :This page is about the city. For the district of the same name, please see Ludwigsburg (district). Ludwigsburg () is a city in the center of Baden- WÃ¼rttemberg. It is about from the Stuttgart city center. It is the district town and largest city of the Ludwigsburg district, as well as after Esslingen at the Neckar the second largest medium-sized town of Baden-Wuerttemberg. Together with Kornwestheim, Ludwigsburg forms a central center for the surrounding municipalities. Since 1 April 1956, Ludwigsburg is a large district town.
